author: ETA PRIME
description:
Unlock the future of mobile gaming with the Absolute M4 Snap-On Mobile Controller! In this hands-on review, I dive into this ultra-portable, MagSafe-compatible controller that's perfect for iPhone, Android, and even laptops. Funded in under a minute on Indiegogo, it's pocket-sized, Bluetooth 5.3 enabled, and features improved slider analog sticks, a solid D-pad, triggers, and more. I test it with emulation, cloud gaming like GeForce Now and Xbox Cloud, native games, and the Absolute app for firmware updates and game recommendations. Available in colors like Phantom Black, Retro White, Cosmic Orange, and potentially Indigo/Atomic Purple. Is it the best travel controller for on-the-go gaming? Watch to find out!
Learn More Here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1932181238/m4-snap-on-magnetic-phone-controller-for-anytime-pocket-play

Follow Me On Twitter: https://twitter.com/theetaprime
Follow Me On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/etaprime/

title: Abxylute M4 Hands-On First Look: Ultimate Portable Snap-On Controller!
